def_en: Someone's mother country is the country in which they or their ancestors were born and to which they still feel emotionally linked, even if they live somewhere else.

def_cn: (控制别国的)母国；宗主国
def_en: If you refer to the mother country of a particular state or country, you are referring to the very powerful country that used to control its affairs.
